MIME element (text/plain)
29 June 2006 
 
DMCA Notice 
 
 
To: ThePlanet 
 
 
Dear Sir or Madam, 
 
1.        I assert copyright to the image files stored at:  
 
http://members.optusnet.com.au/~weezil0/darp_eats_cows_with_KETCHUP.jpg
http://members.optusnet.com.au/~weezil0/darp_eats_cows.jpg
http://members.optusnet.com.au/~weezil0/darp_pits.jpg 
  
2.        A user of ThePlanet has reproduced these image files or
substantial portions of them without permission and has stored the files
on your facilities at: 
 
http://www.downundernewslinks.com/gallery/thumbs/lrg-254-darp_eats_cows_
with_ketchup.jpg
http://www.downundernewslinks.com/gallery/thumbs/lrg-253-darp_eats_cows.
jpg
http://www.downundernewslinks.com/gallery/thumbs/lrg-270-gbmeedit.jpg 
 
downundernewslinks.com appears via TRACERT to be running on ThePlanet's
facilities.  
 
3.        My Contact Information: weezil@machinegunkeyboard.com 
 
4.        Infringer's Contact Information: unknown - domain name
downundernewslinks.com registered by proxy 
 
5.        I assert that use of the copyrighted materials described above
on the allegedly infringing web page is not authorized by the copyright
owner or agents or the law. 
 
6.        I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the
notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner. 
 
I respectfully request that ThePlanet remove the cited infringing
images.  
 
 
Sincerely, 
  
 
Brian Stokes
8 Jaffa Rd
Round Corner NSW
2158 Australia
tel: +61 2 9885 7011
email: weezil@machinegunkeyboard.com
